name: Dream Walker (itch) (DRAKOSEA)
description:
Requirements

Windows x64

Disk space : 226MB

================

How to play

WASD - movement

Left mouse button (Hold)- attack

ESC/ P - Pause menu

==============

What is this game?

Facing waves of enemies then kill the boss

No sound?

yes

Nothing else?

yes

How is it fit the theme "Death is only the beginning"?

I'll explain in the next section

===================

Dream Walker

Ones that walk in the land of dream, Ones that can make different.

They said sleep is a form of death, Sleep is also the gate to dream land.

For Dream Walkers, Dream is only the beginning.
